Question
========
For a Mixed Design ANOVA examining whether the performance of schoolchildren differs between 3 subjects (literature, essay writing, mathematics) and whether those differences vary between male and female schoolchildren, 2 assumptions about variances apply: the homogeneity of variances and sphericity.

The assumption of sphericity implies, among other things, that the variance of \[1\] **...** is equal to the variance of \[2\] **...**.

Answerlist
----------
* \[1\] women's scores in each of the three subjects
  \[2\] men's scores in each of the three subjects
* \[1\] women's scores in each of the three subjects
  \[2\] scores in mathematics - scores in essay writing
* \[1\] scores in literature - scores in mathematics
  \[2\] men's scores in each of the three subjects
* \[1\] scores in literature - scores in mathematics
  \[2\] scores in mathematics - scores in essay writing

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* False
* True
